title: Time and Space, the Shape of the Universe, Olbers' Paradox and an Expanding Universe
description:
Dave did his university work in astrophysics although he now works in high tech, so he was a natural go-to-guy for Karen's questions about the nature of the relationship between time and space. The questions arose from Karen's reading of The Language of Creation by Matthieu Pageau. Books and links mentioned below, plus links to previous conversations with Dave.

Pick a goal and aim at it! Dave's story:
https://youtu.be/6dbaljDJRlo

The Eagle, the Mole and the Shepherd: a new paradigm for action:
https://youtu.be/mPos4tpD7xE

Boundaries, Limits and the Edge of Time:
https://youtu.be/Onl6qfPDEpg

The Language of Creation by Matthieu Pageau:
https://www.amazon.com/Language-Creation-Symbolism-Genesis-Commentary/dp/1981549331/ref=sr_1_1?crid=37HSH9P9B0SGA&dchild=1&keywords=the+language+of+creation+matthieu+pageau&qid=1634328337&sprefix=The+Language+of+Creation%2Caps%2C231&sr=8-1

The Story of the Bible (mentioned by Dave):
https://read.amazon.com/kp/embed?asin=B00YFT0F7A&preview=newtab&linkCode=kpe&ref_=cm_sw_r_kb_dp_JMSP30T809YWZTSFCJ04

What the Bible is All About by Henrietta Mears:
https://read.amazon.com/kp/embed?asin=B0198U6A38&preview=newtab&linkCode=kpe&ref_=cm_sw_r_kb_dp_ZZ2FEYS8TB1TFWABBX3R

List of physics videos from Sabine Hossenfelder's channel:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1yNl2E66ZzKApQdRuTQ4tw
